channel.title: bitcache on Marcel Jurtz
channel.description: Recent content in bitcache on Marcel Jurtz

item.title: Bitcache and K.im
item.description: After Kim Dotcom announced his new service, I just had to sign up for an invitation. After receiving it an hour later, I tried it out. In this article, I’ll document my experience with k.im. I have to admit that I didn’t exactly know what I was getting into. After clicking the received URL, a very minimalistic website is displayed. So, the service allows you to upload files. I never would have thought of that.
